name: Plugged (jenkgames)
description:
--Press TAB at the start of the game to select your first engineer--

--Resolutions below 1920x1080 are not supported--

Plugged is a hard game where your spaceship lost all its pipes while trying to escape space pirates. You play as two engineers that hold either end of an omnitube, trying to frantically keep the ship running for as long as possible.

We've made this game with a few people, some of which was their very first jam.
Surely an experience to say the least. We hope you enjoy!

Controls: 

AWSD: Move around 

E: Attach/Detach Pipe (if in range) 

Tab: Switch Between Engineers 

Esc: Pause the Game

Good luck and see how far you can get!
